page.title: 13Health
page.content: General practitioner surguries are at{Montgomery & Bishops Castle}with a weekly session at Churchstoke. Attached to each is a health visitor, midwife and nurses. Specialist treatment & the{nearest casualty {centre is at Shrewsbury, 37 km away. Stone House hospital at Bishops Castle is used mainly for sick and elderly patients. It has general practitioner beds, infant welfare clinic,chiropody, physiopherapy & immunisation sessions. A{Voluntary Car Scheme}operates in our area. Handicapped people journey every Monday morning by bus with a special ramp to a Day Centre in Welshpool. Our village hall has a ramp to enable our two disabled people to approach more easily! Talking Newspaper is available. The nearest dentists are at Bishops Castle, 4 miles away.
